pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.1: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.2: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.7:1.3: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.1: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.2: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.7:2.3: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
